mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fulltextindex_content_${value}` ( `target_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `target_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `target_field` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `content` mediumtext, PRIMARY KEY (`target_id`, `target_type`, `target_field`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fulltextindex_field_${value}` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `word_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '词id', `target_field` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '字段', `target_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '类型', `target_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '目标文档id', `counter` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '出现次数', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `idx_word` (`word_id`, `target_id`, `target_type`, `target_field`), KEY `idx_target_id` (`target_id`, `target_type`, `target_field`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 308562271470530 DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fulltextindex_offset_${value}` ( `field_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'field_id', `start` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'start', `end` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'end', PRIMARY KEY (`field_id`, `start`, `end`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4
